features: Professional Steamer Iron - Keep your fabrics fresh and crease-free with Steam & Go’s All-in-One Garment Steam Iron. Our clothing steamer has a built-in iron board, a hanger with garment clips, and all the attachments you need to make steaming a breeze.

Effortlessly De-Wrinkles Fabric - This hand steamer for clothes features 1500W of power to remove wrinkles and creases from garments. Unlike a regular ironing machine, our laundry steamer moistens your fabrics’ fibers to make them easier to press.

Safe to Use - We design premium steam press irons with a patented “cool touch” hose to protect your fingers from getting scalded. Each standing steamer for clothes also has an ON/OFF foot pedal and thermostat control for steam intensity adjustment.

High-Capacity Tank System - Now, you no longer need to constantly refill your shirt steamer’s reservoir. This fabric steamer for clothes has a 1-liter tank for water or any steam liquid. Per refill delivers an impressive 30 minutes of continuous use.

Easy to Store - Replace your heavy, bulky dress steamer with our modular garment steamer for clothes with stand. This iron steamer is lightweight and compact; you can easily fold its telescopic aluminum bars into the folding rack and store it after use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Steam & Go - All-in-One Garment Steamer and Iron Introducing our All-in-One Garment Steamer and Iron - a powerful pressurized steamer that effortlessly eliminates wrinkles and creases from your clothes. Its unique design includes an ironing board and clothing hanger, making it a convenient and efficient solution for your garment care needs.

Say Hello to Wrinkle-Free Fabric! You've got a reliable solution with Steam & Go! Our All-in-One Garment Steamer and Iron makes keeping your fabrics crisp and wrinkle-free a breeze, whether you're at home or on the move. Experience the convenience of a perfectly pressed wardrobe with ease anytime, anywhere!

ALL-in-1 Garment Steamer & Iron Steamer and Iron Our innovative product combines the power of a steamer and an iron in one making garment care a breeze.! The steam from the iron moistens the fibers of your clothes and makes them easier to press. Not only this, but the steam also helps keep the fibers in place for a longer duration. This ensures that your clothes look sharp throughout the day. Say hello to efficiency and convenience as you effortlessly remove wrinkles and creases from your clothes. ALL-in-1 Garment Steamer & Iron Pressurized Steam Iron Introducing our revolutionary Pressurized Steam Iron - an advanced garment care marvel! Experience the sheer power of pressurized steam as it effortlessly glides through fabrics, delivering unparalleled wrinkle removal with ease. Unlike regular steam irons, our pressurized steam iron generates higher steam pressure for a more forceful and consistent output, ensuring every crease is vanquished. ALL-in-1 Garment Steamer & Iron Clothing Hanger With the Clothing Hanger, achieve flawless alignment for your garments, ensuring a smooth ironing surface free from creases or misalignments. Say goodbye to ironing frustrations and hello to perfectly pressed clothes! ALL-in-1 Garment Steamer & Iron Ironing Board Introducing our premium Ironing Board - the perfect companion for hassle-free ironing! Designed with your convenience in mind, our ironing board provides a spacious and sturdy surface to tackle any wrinkle with ease. It offers exceptional durability and stability, making it an essential addition to your laundry routine.

Powerful on Wrinkles, Gentle on Fabrics Effortlessly keep your fabrics fresh and crease-free using our versatile clothing steamer.- your ultimate garment care companion! Featuring a built-in iron board and hanger with garment clips, steaming becomes a breeze. Elevate your garment care routine now!

Why Choose Us No Harmful Chemicals Enjoy the power of our All-in-One Garment Steamer and Iron- free from harmful chemicals! With a 1-liter tank, ideal for any steam liquid you prefer. Easy to Assemble No more complicated setups or frustrating instructions. Enjoy quick and easy assembly for instant steaming convenience. Easy to Store This lightweight and compact iron steamer allows for easy storage after use, making it a perfect replacement for heavy, bulky dress steamers. 1500 Watts of Power Experience the 1500W power of our clothes steamer! Unlike regular ironing machines, our steamer moistens fabric fibers, making pressing a breeze.

Works well with a wide range of fabrics Drapes Designed to work seamlessly with drapes, our solution ensures a perfect combination of style and functionality. Clothing Specially crafted to work harmoniously with all types of fabrics, from delicate silks to sturdy denims, our product handles it all with care. Sheets Crafted to work wonders on your bed sheets! Effortlessly removes wrinkles and creases, it ensures a beautifully inviting bed setup every night. Furniture Embrace the feeling of sinking into a beautifully refreshed furniture that looks and feels brand new.

The Cleaning Partners Supra Pro 10-in-1 Steamer Multi-surface cleaner Portable Garment Steamer Product Recommendation Versatile: floor steamer, carpet cleaner, countertop, clothing and more! Product Recommendation All-Purpose Cleaner Mopping Solution; Use as floor, wall and tile cleaner Product Recommendation Can freshen up your bedding, curtains, couches and more! For all fabric types. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Compact Design with Excellent Steam Generation
reviews.reviewText: Needed a compact system and generous steam and ironing function. Easy to assemble, will likely last long as long as I’m not rough with it. The product was designed well and it’s sturdy.Cons: the board is not very big. When ironing shirts the sleeves hit the floor. Would have been fantastic if there was a window to see how much water is in the tank. Or a similar funnel that my older steam iron had with a little pop up indicator so you knew to stop pouring. As it stands now, I find out when it over flows.That aside, it’s a nice all-in-one compact unit that stores well and generates enough steam to get the wrinkles out without soaking the item you’re ironing. It’s does have some weak spots but shouldn’t be an issue as long as I handle with care.I even made a slip cover to put over it to keep it clean when not in use which should help keep it in good shape for longer.Important Note: The first one I received arrived damaged. It was an unfortunate, irregular type of damage that I’m sure doesn’t happen often, but to ensure your product arrives in perfect condition you may want to check the box that says something about using an Amazon shipping carton in addition to the product box (found on the last page of checkout - follows somewhere after your chosen payment method).NEW INPUT:I’ve had some time to use this unit and find it to almost make the mark. The areas that could be improved are:1). ironing board size and stability leg. The size is just too small. If it was at least two inches wider it would be better. With the narrow size and how low it is, all shirts end up touching the floor at one point which isn’t ideal.2). The stability leg doesn’t lock in place well and if you’re ironing with any pressure it slides down (gets shorter).3) The boiler - would have been awesome if there was a level indicator so you knew how much water it can take when filling and how close you are to running out.5) Steam is strong but clothes end up rather damp and have to lay flat or be hung before folding due to dampness.4) The clothing steamer/hanger. Is a great concept except any item that you have hanging that us as wide as the side bars will lay up against the hot iron while in its holder or get in the way of using the iron holder. The top hanger holder could be a couple of inches longer so the clothes clear the area around the iron.The positives are its overall design - easy to store and use. The boiler holds a good amount of water so you can iron for over an hour without having to refill. I’m trying to be careful not to handle it roughly since it is mostly plastic. All-in-all I’m happy. Just need to adjust the way I use steam to avoid over saturating the clothing. Since I iron in the garage I have to lay a towel on the floor so my sleeves don’t get dirty due to the lower height of the ironing surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One Stop Shop
reviews.reviewText: I really appreciate the design concept for this all-in-one steamer. I like that it has an ironing board and a hanging space for your garments. I wish the hose was a bit more stretchy but overall, I am pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it, it’s perfect for what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this iron/steamer for my daughter and her only complaint thus far is that she wished that it wasn’t so big because of her apartment size. She says that the iron and steamer works great and that it heats up well getting the wrinkles out. She said the steamer has saved her time with getting ready in the morning for work and school.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trabaja excelente mente ,proporciona un vapor tremendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use all-in-one steamer and iron
reviews.reviewText: Overall, I am very happy with this all-in-one steamer and iron, and I love the convenience and how much space it saves. The iron and the steamer function as expected, and the water tank is large enough to steam and iron an entire week's worth of clothing.The steam produced by this unit is high-pressure and can quickly turn your room into a sauna if you overdo it. Strangely enough, my old steamer that emitted a steady, gentle stream was far more effective at removing wrinkles, but this steamer will still do the trick. The iron functions just as well as a full-sized iron, and the ironing board is very easy to use and then fold back up into the unit.On the downside, I really wish there were wheels on the bottom of this unit so it could be moved easily. I also wish there was an easy-to-see on/off button, and the cool/ hot lights were larger and easier to see while ironing my clothes. Draining the remaining water from the unit is cumbersome, and there is no way to see how much water is in the tank.While there are some trade-offs to getting an all-in-one unit, this is a good choice if you need to save space or prefer the convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife loves it!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: We have one at our beach house and my wife likes it. Took me a while to find one (didn’t think of Amazon,WHAT?). She loves the features of this one even more.
